text: Sahand Ski Resort is a ski resort in northern slopes of Mount Sahand, in vicinity of Tabriz, North West of Iran. The resort has an ski area with a length of 1200 meters. The ski season in this resort depends on the winter precipitation (normally starts from January and it continues until mid March).http://www.worldtraveliran.com/index.php/iran-hotel/125-tour/ski- tours/ski-resort/446-dena-kakan-ski-resort-2 ==References== Category:Ski areas and resorts in Iran Category:Sports venues in Tabriz
title: Sahand Ski Resort
